paragraph: “Mad Pain and Martian Pain.” In N. Block (ed.) Readings in Philosophy of Psychology, vol. 1. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press: 216–22. question: What is the title of a 2019 article titled "Pain", published in the Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy?
